text: Matthew Richard "Matt" Stone (born May 26, 1971) is an Academy Award- nominated Emmy Award- winning American animator, screenwriter, director, producer, voice actor, musician and actor. He and Trey Parker created the animated television series, South Park. ==Other websites== Category:American animators Category:American movie actors Category:Screenwriters from Texas Category:Emmy Award winners Category:Actors from Houston Category:Writers from Houston Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Libertarians
title: Matt Stone
